news_header: Science News introduces a new format and monthly publication with enhanced visual storytelling and a focus on engaging readers.
news_text: Science News is evolving with a new look and format while maintaining its mission of providing accurate science news. The magazine will now be published monthly, featuring larger pages, more visuals, and new content such as health columns and science-themed puzzles. This change aims to better serve a diverse readership and enhance the overall experience. The publication continues to emphasize the importance of scientific literacy and encourages subscriptions to support its mission.
